messages.title: LA BOUR IS BACKING THE NEXT GENERATION
messages.content: For the first time in more than a century, this generation will struggle to do better than the last. Labour has a better plan.

messages.title: Higher living standards for working families
messages.content: The Tory cost of living crisis has left families across Britain reeling. Stagnant wages.

messages.title: Labour kick-starts election campaign
messages.content: As the election campaign officially opens in five days, Labour has revealed its strategy encapsulating the principles of a plan of the General Election Manifesto.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher living standards for working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour plans to freeze energy bills up to 2017 for working people, have a lower tuition fees, get 200,000 homes built per year, and cut income tax for 24 million people.

quotes.text: A better plan. A better future.
